$interpreted: Miranda: I'm Miranda, an exchange student from the Kingdom of the Sun... I've asked my Master for permission to come and explore Fog Sect Territory~ And yourself?
Tindoiimu: (She's so unguarded, and all just because of a little helping hand from a stranger... And she's got a sincere smile just like Sophie's, too...)
Tindoiimu: I'm Tim.
Miranda: ...Tim? You must be one of the nobles of the East, to judge from your character. But you look a lot like you're from my homeland, too. You wouldn't happen to be...
Miranda: —Ah!
Miranda: ...C-close call. Just a lantern.
Miranda: I'm sorry, where were we—
Tindoiimu: Let's move forward, there must be another group waiting behind us.
Miranda: True...
Miranda: Gyaaaah!
Tindoiimu: ………
Tindoiimu: You're not—
Miranda: N-no! Whad'dya mean!? I'm just not used to things... popping up in front of me!
Tindoiimu: Okay, but in that case, what did you expect when you came to a haunted house?
Miranda: I'm just curious! Anyway, it's all smoke and mirrors~ I'm not scared of ghosts! Ahahaha!
Miranda: Everything in this world has a rational explanation. There's no such thing as... g-g-g-ghosts!
Tindoiimu: (She's shaking in her boots. Is she really okay?)
Tindoiimu: ...Got it. Let's go, then.
Miranda: W-wait, Tim... Wait for me! Sorry! I got a little spooked and froze up...
Tindoiimu: (We'll never get out of here if she keeps this up... And if Juan-Yun decides to come this way—)
Tindoiimu: (Better get moving and look for an exit.)
Miranda: I'm h-here!!! Let's go!!
Miranda: Uh... Eh!?
Miranda: T-Tim! Slow down! Wait for me!
Joan: ...This looks like the place. This is what I came to the East for!
Joan: (The "Book of Vanquishing", one of the three forbidden books spoken of in Eastern legends... Said to be passed down from the immortals.)
Joan: (The legends say that the incantations within are capable of summoning dead spirits and placing them under one's command...)
Joan: (If that's true, then at last I'll have someone to help me line up for those limited-edition romance novels every month!!)
Joan: (Time for the Thief of the Gleaming Star to make her grand entrance!)
Haunted House Assistant: Hmm? You... must be...
Joan: (Gwaah, has he already worked out how I knocked the Storyteller cold, before stealing her costume just so I could slip inside undetected!?)
Joan: (Well, I AM the most fabulous star of all. It's not easy for me to go about in cognito...)
Haunted House Assistant: —Oh! Please, won't you autograph my book for me!!!
Joan: ("The Ghost Bride"? That's one of the Storyteller's novels! I must've done a cracking job with my disguise if even her fans don't recognize me~)
Joan: Sure thing~~
Haunted House Assistant: Thank you so much! If you have any problems while you're here, please don't hesitate to send for me~ I'll let you get on with your work!
Joan: Who'd have thought my costume would be such a success... Looks like everything's gonna go according to plan~
Joan: ...Hmm? Where am I?
Joan: Drat~~ I got distracted for one moment and now I'm lost!
???: Gyaaaagh!!!
Miranda: Wah... How can she just disappear like that?
Miranda: Tim, wh-where are you... Don't leave me...
Joan: (Huh? She must be another guest. But why's she look so ghastly?)
Joan: (Whatever~ Guess I'll have to go find out!)
Miranda: ...I can't go on like this. You're a warrior, Miranda, you've just gotta... pull yourself together.
Miranda: Facing demons is just another part of your training...
Joan: Sooo~ Any idea where the hell we are—
Miranda: GYAAAAAAAAGHH!!! Stay away!! G-g-g-GHOSTS!!!
Joan: No no no, you've got it all wrong! Take a good look, I'm no ghost!!
Miranda: —A-an evil spirit!? Get out of here!!!
Joan: Hey! Are you blind or what? What's wrong with you?
Tindoiimu: Was that... Miranda screaming?
Tindoiimu: I'll ask the employees to go look for her once I'm out of here...
Tindoiimu: (...No exit here. And it's a dead end up ahead. They must have placed the way out somewhere else.)
Tindoiimu: (...When did she appear? I didn't see anybody a moment ago... And what about those flames... dancing in mid-air...)
Tindoiimu: Excuse me, passing through.
Tindoiimu: (The door's locked...!)
???: I hear my baby crying again...
???: Don't you hear it? A bloodcurdling scream, wrapped in the sound of a storm...
???: ...But I can't find him.
???: I can't even remember who I am, or why I've been shut away in here...
Tindoiimu: (...Shut away?)
???: Pacing back and forth... endlessly... every day...
Joan: How many times must I tell you! I'm going to knock some sense into you, on behalf of the stars~~
Miranda: No! Don't come any closer!
Tindoiimu: (Is that Miranda? And...)
Miranda: You! Y-y-you're alive!?
Miranda: Thank... thank heavens. Finally somebody's here—
Miranda: There's n-no such thing as ghosts. Nope... nada... nein...
Miranda: ……………
Miranda: HYAA──────────────！

Model.Text: I'm Miranda, an exchange student from the Kingdom of the Sun... I've asked my Master for permission to come and explore Fog Sect Territory~ And yourself?
(She's so unguarded, and all just because of a little helping hand from a stranger... And she's got a sincere smile just like Sophie's, too...)
I'm Tim.
...Tim? You must be one of the nobles of the East, to judge from your character. But you look a lot like you're from my homeland, too. You wouldn't happen to be...
—Ah!
...C-close call. Just a lantern.
I'm sorry, where were we—
Let's move forward, there must be another group waiting behind us.
True...
Gyaaaah!
You're not—
N-no! Whad'dya mean!? I'm just not used to things... popping up in front of me!
Okay, but in that case, what did you expect when you came to a haunted house?
I'm just curious! Anyway, it's all smoke and mirrors~ I'm not scared of ghosts! Ahahaha!
Everything in this world has a rational explanation. There's no such thing as... g-g-g-ghosts!
(She's shaking in her boots. Is she really okay?)
...Got it. Let's go, then.
W-wait, Tim... Wait for me! Sorry! I got a little spooked and froze up...
(We'll never get out of here if she keeps this up... And if Juan-Yun decides to come this way—)
(Better get moving and look for an exit.)
I'm h-here!!! Let's go!!
Uh... Eh!?
T-Tim! Slow down! Wait for me!
...This looks like the place. This is what I came to the East for!
(The "Book of Vanquishing", one of the three forbidden books spoken of in Eastern legends... Said to be passed down from the immortals.)
(The legends say that the incantations within are capable of summoning dead spirits and placing them under one's command...)
(If that's true, then at last I'll have someone to help me line up for those limited-edition romance novels every month!!)
(Time for the Thief of the Gleaming Star to make her grand entrance!)
Hmm? You... must be...
(Gwaah, has he already worked out how I knocked the Storyteller cold, before stealing her costume just so I could slip inside undetected!?)
(Well, I AM the most fabulous star of all. It's not easy for me to go about in cognito...)
—Oh! Please, won't you autograph my book for me!!!
("The Ghost Bride"? That's one of the Storyteller's novels! I must've done a cracking job with my disguise if even her fans don't recognize me~)
Sure thing~~
Thank you so much! If you have any problems while you're here, please don't hesitate to send for me~ I'll let you get on with your work!
Who'd have thought my costume would be such a success... Looks like everything's gonna go according to plan~
...Hmm? Where am I?
Drat~~ I got distracted for one moment and now I'm lost!
Gyaaaagh!!!
Wah... How can she just disappear like that?
Tim, wh-where are you... Don't leave me...
(Huh? She must be another guest. But why's she look so ghastly?)
(Whatever~ Guess I'll have to go find out!)
...I can't go on like this. You're a warrior, Miranda, you've just gotta... pull yourself together.
Facing demons is just another part of your training...
Sooo~ Any idea where the hell we are—
GYAAAAAAAAGHH!!! Stay away!! G-g-g-GHOSTS!!!
No no no, you've got it all wrong! Take a good look, I'm no ghost!!
—A-an evil spirit!? Get out of here!!!
Hey! Are you blind or what? What's wrong with you?
Was that... Miranda screaming?
I'll ask the employees to go look for her once I'm out of here...
(...No exit here. And it's a dead end up ahead. They must have placed the way out somewhere else.)
(...When did she appear? I didn't see anybody a moment ago... And what about those flames... dancing in mid-air...)
Excuse me, passing through.
(The door's locked...!)
I hear my baby crying again...
Don't you hear it? A bloodcurdling scream, wrapped in the sound of a storm...
...But I can't find him.
I can't even remember who I am, or why I've been shut away in here...
(...Shut away?)
Pacing back and forth... endlessly... every day...
How many times must I tell you! I'm going to knock some sense into you, on behalf of the stars~~
No! Don't come any closer!
(Is that Miranda? And...)
You! Y-y-you're alive!?
Thank... thank heavens. Finally somebody's here—
There's n-no such thing as ghosts. Nope... nada... nein...
